CONFIGURATION.S_CATEGORIES_C_POPULAR_DOC: Enable the Popular Radios Category in Main Menu, which is a meta category of Popular radios in your area
CONFIGURATION.S_CATEGORIES_C_BEST_DOC: Enable the Best Radios Category in Main Menu, which is a meta category of high quality radios in your area
CONFIGURATION.S_TESTING_C_EXPERIMENTAL_DOC: Turn this on if you are willing to test experimental features and provide feedback. Do not enable unless you want to be in for a bumpy ride.
